DOC.brief_title: Integrated Population Program Diabetic Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: Potentially eligible patient identify use exist SEDI ( Southeastern Diabetes Initiative ) data warehouse pull electronic health record data quarterly ten different source system four county . Adults ( age ≥18 75 year ) ; Diagnosis type 2 diabetes ( ICD9 cod 250.x0 , 250.x2 ) ; Have least 2 serum creatinine value available 3 prior year , separate least 3 month ; Preserved kidney function ( base upon last year 's eGFR average 4590 ml/min/1.73m2 , estimate calculate eGFR use 4variable Modification Diet Renal Disease study equation ) ; Evidence diabetic nephropathy ( Either : 1. presence macroalbuminuria ; 2. history microalbuminuria prior ACE ( angiotensinconverting enzyme ) inhibitor angiotensin receptor blocker ( ARB ) therapy ; 3. previous documentation diabetic retinopathy laser therapy ; 4. microalbuminuria # 3 , urinalysis without hematuria , renal etiology [ i.e. , glomerulonephritis , polycystic kidney disease , membranous nephropathy , renal artery stenosis ] ) Uncontrolled HTN ( 1y mean clinic SBP≥140 and/or DBP≥90 ) . Patients meet one exclusion criterion exclude : No access telephone Not proficient English Nursing home/longterm care facility resident receive home health care Impaired hearing/ speech/ vision Participating another trial ( pharmaceutical behavioral ) Planning leave area next 3 year Pancreatic insufficiency diabetes secondary pancreatitis Alcohol abuse ( > 14 alcoholic beverages/ wk ) Diagnosis nondiabetic kidney disease Active malignancy ( nonmelanomatous skin cancer ) Diagnosis lifethreatening disease death probable within 4 year .
